subtitle: Aubergine, courgette, tomato, tuna and olives make a tasty and healthy filling for baked potatoes.

method.text: Place the diced aubergine in a shallow dish.
Heat half the oil in a large frying pan. Fry the onion, garlic and courgettes for 3-4 min until softened. Remove from pan with a slotted spoon. Set aside.
Heat the remaining oil in a large frying pan. Fry the aubergine for 4-5 min, stirring constantly, until well browned.
Return the onion mixture to the pan with remaining ingredients. Simmer for 5 min or until hot.
Spoon the filling into baked potatoes.

title: Mediterranean tuna medley filling for baked potatoes
